text: Matthew Faber (January 31, 1973 â€“ March 28, 2020) was an American actor. He was best known for his roles in movie and television series such as Welcome to the Dollhouse,The New York Times Guide to the Best 1,000 Movies Ever Made Natural Born Killers, Law & Order and Palindromes. Faber died at his apartment in Van Nuys, California on March 28, 2020, at the age of 47. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:2020 deaths Category:1973 births
title: Matthew Faber
